TopicTitle: Heat shield left a shroud over a docking port - is the docking port still usable?

Articles.Content: In the screenshot, the orange fuel tank with heat shield has separated from the large docking port to which it was attached but it has left the heatshield shroud attached to the docking port. Can the docking port still be used?
Time accelerate to "on rails"; shrouds tend to disappear when you drop back to physical
And if that doesn't work, switch temporarily to another craft or KSC.  It will definitely be gone when you switch back.
